title: 103F.145 ENFORCEMENT AND PENALTIES.
text:
Every structure, fill, deposit, or other floodplain use placed or maintained in the floodplain in violation of a floodplain management ordinance adopted under the provisions of sections 103F.105 to 103F.151 is a public nuisance.
The creation of a public nuisance under this section may be enjoined and the maintenance of a public nuisance under this section may be abated by an action brought by the commissioner or a local governmental unit.
A person who violates a provision of sections 103F.105 to 103F.151 is guilty of a misdemeanor. Each day that the violation exists is a separate offense.
